<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Run this fix script to make Knowledge Management Service Portal pages public.</description>
        <name>Make KM Service Portal Pages Public</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var pages = new GlideRecord("sp_page");
pages.addQuery("id", "IN", "kb_home,kb_search,kb_article_view");
pages.addQuery("public", false);
pages.query();
var pgCnt = 0;
while(pages.next()) {
	pages.setValue("public", true);
	if(pages.update())
		pgCnt++;
	else
		gs.info(pages.id + " could not be marked as public", "KM_SP_PAGE_PUBLIC");
}
gs.info(pgCnt + " service portal pages are marked as public", "KM_SP_PAGE_PUBLIC");]]></script>
